EmailTemplate.name: You're not alone; join your peers | for CW14 regional DC promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Almost at room capacity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're not alone
Join us this May for three days of networking with like-minded executives. Register now at the discounted rate of $1,295, 19 CPE credit opportunities, and an agenda you can customize.
We've packed the agenda with sessions and speakers already this year. Below are a few highlights from the CW2014 keynote roster to whet your appetite.
KEYNOTE | Peter Swire Professor of Business & Privacy Law Georgia Institute of Technology Presidential adviser on NSA eavesdropping
KEYNOTE | Kara M. Stein Commissioner U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission
KEYNOTE | Andrew Ceresney Director of Enforcement U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission A few of the sessions we are excited about
May 19 | Integrating Enhanced Audit Expectations Into the Control Regime May 19 | Corporate Culture as a Top-Level Control May 19 | Scared Straight: Teaching the Importance of Corporate Governance May 20 | Third-Party Risk Management at Decentralized Companies May 20 | Digging for Success With Conflict Minerals
CLICK | CALL 617-570-8617 | EMAIL
